ModMetaData.name: Psychic Psychite
ModMetaData.author: Nephelem
ModMetaData.description:
Makes it so drugs made from psychite give psychic buffs.
Psychite tea gives +15% psychic sensitivity +10% meditiation focus gain
Flake gives +5% psyfocus +25% psychic sensitivity +15% meditiation focus gain
Yayo gives +10% psyfocus +30% psychic sensitivity +20% meditiation focus gain
Uses patch operations so should be compatible with just about anything.
